text: Nimagenu, nim'ma hindina nuh‌ra jananga, ad hagu samud janangagalu mattu avara anantaradavara suddi talupillave? Nijavagi avara kuritu (vastavavu) allahana horatu berarigu tilidilla. Avara (kalada) devadutaru spasta puravegalondige avara balige bandiddaru. Adare avaru tam'ma kaigalannu avara (dutara) bayigalige tallidaru mattu ‘‘yavudarondige nim'mannu kalisalagideyo avannu navu dhikkarisutteve mattu yavudara kadege nivu nam'mannu amantrisuttiruviro a kuritu navu ghora sansayadalliddeve’’ endaru
